title: Upgrade Network Directory to McKinsey Our People page style

requirements.text: Update the Network Directory page (frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx) layout to match McKinsey's Our People page card-based profile design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people, with profile cards displaying in a responsive grid layout
acceptanceCriteria: Profile cards are arranged in a responsive grid matching McKinsey's layout
Cards display stakeholder photos/avatars prominently
Each card shows name, role/title, and location information
Grid adapts to different screen sizes appropriately

requirements.text: Update Network Directory card styling to match McKinsey's profile card design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people, including card borders, shadows, hover effects, image treatment, and typography hierarchy
acceptanceCriteria: Card design matches McKinsey's visual style with appropriate borders and shadows
Hover effects provide visual feedback matching the reference
Typography hierarchy clearly distinguishes name, role, and other details
Image/avatar treatment matches McKinsey's professional presentation

requirements.text: Implement an enhanced filtering system in the Network Directory matching McKinsey's Our People page functionality from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people, with filters for stakeholder category, location, specialty/service area, and clear filter controls
acceptanceCriteria: Filter controls are prominently displayed and easy to use
Multiple filters can be applied simultaneously
Active filters are clearly indicated
Filter UI matches McKinsey's design patterns

requirements.text: Add professional profile detail views in the Network Directory that expand or navigate to show comprehensive stakeholder information including bio, services, experience, and contact options, matching the interaction pattern from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a profile card reveals detailed information
Detail view shows comprehensive stakeholder profile
Navigation between list and detail views is intuitive
Layout matches McKinsey's profile detail presentation

requirements.text: Update Network Directory page spacing, padding, and overall layout structure to match McKinsey's generous whitespace and content organization from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/our-people
acceptanceCriteria: Page layout uses generous whitespace matching McKinsey's style
Section spacing creates clear visual separation
Content margins and padding match the reference design
Overall page structure feels professional and uncluttered

constraints: Maintain existing backend data structures and API endpoints for stakeholder data
Preserve authentication and role-based access control logic
Keep existing filtering functionality while enhancing the UI
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the backend data models or API structure
Modifying other pages beyond the Network Directory
Adding new stakeholder types or categories
